'''Audacity''' is a free [[digital audio editor]] application. Audacity is [[cross-platform]], using the [[wxWidgets]] software [[library (computer science)|library]] to provide a similar [[graphical user interface]] on several different [[operating system]]s. It is currently used in the OCR National Level 2 ICT course for the sound creation unit.
'''Audacity''' is a free [[digital audio editor]] application. Audacity is [[cross-platform]], using the [[wxWidgets]] software [[library (computer science)|library]] to provide a similar [[graphical user interface]] on several different [[operating system]]s. It is currently used in the OCR National Level 2 ICT course for the sound creation unit.
